meanings.definition: lacking the power of hearing or having impaired hearing
meanings.sent1: The deaf boy communicated using sign language.
meanings.sent2: She wore hearing aids to help with her deaf ears.
meanings.sent3: The deaf cat ignored its owner calling for dinner.
meanings.sent4: The deafening silence in the room made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: The deafening roar of the crowd at the concert was exhilarating.

meanings.definition: unwilling or unable to hear or pay attention to something
meanings.sent1: The stubborn child was deaf to his mother's pleas.
meanings.sent2: The student was deaf to the teacher's instructions.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed deaf to the sound of the can opener.
meanings.sent4: Her words fell on deaf ears as he continued to ignore her.
meanings.sent5: The warning sirens were deaf to the reckless driver.
